sentences.en: A woman is busy making beancurd while her husband runs to her hilariously , saying that they have finally obtained the " sanitation license".
sentences.cn: 一个女人正忙着做豆腐，此时他的丈夫欢天喜地地跑过来告诉她他们终于拿到了"卫生许可证"。

sentences.en: Add beancurd skin and boil for another 10 minutes. Season with salt.
sentences.cn: 最后加入腐竹皮滚10分钟, 以盐调味即成.

sentences.en: And also Mapo beancurd, fish flavored pork and lettuce with oyster sauce.
sentences.cn: 还有麻婆豆腐, 鱼香肉丝和蚝油生菜.

sentences.en: And i love beancurd so much!
sentences.cn: 还有,我最爱这里的苏州豆腐干!

sentences.en: Beijing is a city of gastronomic contradictions. The traditional everyday diet of local people is a simple affair: noodles, breads and dumplings, with pork and mutton, beancurd and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 北京是一个美食矛盾体。当地人的日常传统饮食是一件简单的事：面条、面包和饺子，饺子馅有猪肉、羊肉、豆腐和蔬菜。

sentences.en: Chop coriander and spring onions finely; beancurd puffs with water and then set aside.
sentences.cn: 红椒切丝,蒜头剁蓉, 豆豉冲水后压烂,加滚油拌匀,再加蚝油调味备用.

sentences.en: He likes food made of beancurd.
I think Mapo beancurd and shredded meat in chilli sauce are quite special.
sentences.cn: 我觉得麻婆豆腐和鱼香肉丝味道不错.

sentences.en: May I help you to have some more ( soup, beancurd , etc. )?
sentences.cn: 我再给你添些 ( 汤 、 豆腐 ) 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mix in seasoning. Sprinkle over cucumber, pera , carrot, dried beancurd, soy bean sprouts and sesame. Serve.
sentences.cn: 拌入调味料, 撒上青瓜 、 雪梨 、 红萝卜 、 豆干 、 芽菜及芝麻, 即可食用.

sentences.en: Soak beancurd in the hot water for one minute to remove its smell.
sentences.cn: 豆腐下锅前，可先放在开水里浸渍一刻钟，这样可清除泔水味。

sentences.en: The God of Thunder strikes the beancurd; bullies pick on the soft and weak.
sentences.cn: 雷公打豆腐, 拣软的欺.

sentences.en: Then how about these two dishes, " fried mushrooms and bamboo shoots " and " beancurd with hot pepper "
sentences.cn: 那么, 香菇笋片和 麻辣 豆腐,这两道菜可以吗?

sentences.en: Then put in the fresh beancurd, some pepper , salt and fry.
sentences.cn: 再放入豆腐 、 椒 、 ,然后混起来炒.

sentences.en: They had some fried pork chop and beancurd.
sentences.cn: 他们吃了一些煎猪排和炒豆腐.

sentences.en: This paper introduces the production process of Chinese cabbage preserved beancurd.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了白菜豆腐乳的制作方法,它是成都盆地生产的一种风味腐乳.

sentences.en: Today's specials are diced chicken with dried red pepper and mapo beancurd.
sentences.cn: 今天的特色菜有辣子鸡丁和麻婆豆腐.
